Title: Virtual Columns
Description: _path — Path to the file. Type: LowCardinalty(String)._file — Name of the file. Type: LowCardinalty(String)._size — Size of the file in bytes. Type: Nullable(UInt64). If the file size is unknown, the value is NULL._time — Last modified time of the file. Type: Nullable(DateTime). If the time is unknown, the value is NULL.
